reviewText: My husband uses it everyday  he already plays  a little to advanced. But will come in handy. He would still like to acquire a beginners as so is to far advanced. He just said guitar lessons for old dummies.  Hes 70 yrsyes young
This was exactly what I needed- stuck in a rut with my guitar and needing more. This DVD had lots of good content and helped me to fill in several holes in my learning.
I could not download the material from the web sie that was given.  Having said that I found it difficult to keep up with the instructor
